name: #4 Power Cell
description: The #4 Power Cell is a 80cm x 50cm x 25cm (100 liters) brick that can power a Size 5 device. The PowerCell is a storage battery for operating devices independently. Typically, a PowerCell is one size smaller than the device it powers, lasts for 24 hours (or about-a-day) of continual use, and has negligible discharge during non-use. Cells support micro-induction power transfer, and are capable of powering items without direct connections. The quality of the cell determines its operational life.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
